# https://docs.arcade.dev llms.txt

- [Arcade AI Deployment](https://docs.arcade.dev/home): Learn to deploy AI agents securely with Arcade tools.
- [Spotify Toolkit Overview](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/entertainment/spotify): Interact with Spotify tracks using Arcade's toolkit features.
- [Google Search Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/search/google_search): Enable agents to perform Google searches using SerpAPI.
- [GitHub Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/github): Learn to configure GitHub auth for Arcade applications.
- [LinkedIn Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/social-communication/linkedin): Toolkit for integrating LinkedIn interactions in applications.
- [Arcade Quickstart Guide](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/quickstart?lang=typescript): Quickstart guide for using Arcade.dev with TypeScript.
- [Arcade Engine Configuration](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/local-deployment/configure/overview): Overview of Arcade Engine configuration files and settings.
- [Handle Tool Errors](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/build-tools/handle-tool-errors): Guide to effectively handle tool errors in Arcade SDK.
- [Tool Calling Overview](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/use-tools/tools-overview): Explore tool calling for enhanced AI interactions and applications.
- [Zoom Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/social-communication/zoom): Interact with Zoom to manage meetings and invitations.
- [Arcade Deploy Configuration](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/local-deployment/configure/arcade-deploy): Guide to configure and deploy workers using Arcade CLI.
- [Discord Auth Configuration](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/social-communication/discord): Guide to configuring Discord auth with Arcade tools.
- [Arcade Hosting Overview](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/hosting-overview): Explore hosting options for Arcade, including cloud and local.
- [Asana Toolkit Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/asana/reference): Comprehensive Asana reference for tag colors and task sorting.
- [Arcade Tools with Vercel AI](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/vercelai/use-arcade-tools): Learn to integrate Arcade tools with Vercel AI SDK.
- [404 Error Page](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/search/reference): Page not found error with status updates link.
- [Google Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/google): Integrate Google OAuth for seamless API access in apps.
- [Google Jobs Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/search/google_jobs): Search for job openings using Google Jobs toolkit.

- [Twitch Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/twitch): Guide to configuring Twitch Auth Provider for Arcade.

- [Notion Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/notion): Configure Notion auth provider for seamless API integration.
- [API Key Management](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/api-keys): Learn how to generate and manage your API keys securely.
- [Discord Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/discord): Guide to configuring Discord authentication for Arcade applications.
